content.detailedDescription:
This is voice to text, so there may be some errors that i do not find. on september 4th of 1998 a friend and i were walking and talking in the yard. while outside i started looking straight up at the bright night sky. i made a comment that walking while looking straight up was very difficult, he laughed and i kept doing it while the conversation continued. eventually he said let's try to run while looking straight up. so we were both running in the field looking straight up at the sky telling of how our balance was failing us. at that time two objects came from different directions, 1 east and 1 west. they were almost triangular-shaped from what i could tell, at what distance i can't say. they left a white looking streak that disappeared pretty quick it look like they were going to collide. before collision they both made a 90-degree turn and, in unison, both went south.

the flight paths seemed to be straight lines and 90° turns. whatever they were both looked to be pointed and were slightly wider than their trail was. the turns were made at the exact same time. the paths went from horizon to horizon. i cannot calculate elevation or distance covered.
content.summary: Two objects flying. one east, one west. before collision, both made a 90° turn south. seemingly perfect formation.

content.detailedDescription: i was laying in my bed and i had headphones in because i was watching a movie when all of a sudden i hear what sounds like a snow plow right outside my window. so i shot up and looked outside and not too far of i see a row of pulsating/ flashing bright red lights. i assumed that it was a plain,but it was going very slow and very low too the ground. its lights where in (what i belive)a straight line,(only red lights mind you) in the pitch black of night. so i watched it slowly fly away and i hopped on the flight tracker website and went over to where i live and checked too see if there where any aircraft flying by. but where wasnt.I havnt seen it since. its been about one hour.
content.summary: It wad a row of lights like ive neer seen on a plain, bright red, extremly loud, very low to the ground and slow.

content.detailedDescription: Driving north on highway 127 a little after 10:00pm, no other vehicles in sight. an eastbound light appeared up in the sky in front of me. it was visible for a couple seconds, disappeared for a half second, then reappeared for a second or so until it seemed to go over the horizon. the light was very far away. it was the same size as the stars, but it seemed like the edges were sharper. there was no tail, it wasn't like any meteor i've seen. just a distinct light zinging across the sky. this is the only time i've seen something in the sky and immediately thought: "i just saw a ufo."
content.summary: Light flew across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Wife and i were proceeding north from grande prairie alberta to sexsmith. we noticed an object in the clear blue sky. i thought it might be a lonesome cloud but it just looked so out of place and the colour was really quit different.  ae we headed north it proceeded north and then did a ne turn. when we travelled the 20kms. to homr the object was just ne of our house. it then just disappeared.
i felt very different when i seen the ufo.....Kind of like a bit excited and amazed.
i also seen a picture on facebook that someone else had posted. they were asking if anyone else had observed the object. i dont know how to find the pic. on fb.
content.summary: This object was certainly like no other which i have seen in my 69 years. it was alone in the blue sky.

Saw this object in the sky and decided to film it with my canon sorry for the shaky video. the sky was clear while i was filming, too not a cloud in the sky.   @1:03 of the original video you can see the object is moving right to left - i made this

content.detailedDescription: As a cryptozoologist, i don't normally investigate or take reports on ufo's. however, if a ufo is spotted in the same area as a cryptid, i will. this report was given to me by the 3rd witness to it eric. i do have eric's contact information and he is willing to meet with you if it becomes necessary.
content.summary: Ufo acted like a tour bus.

content.detailedDescription:
It was right around 10pm, on my way home from friend's house, cutting down river road as i always do. nice narrow country road that has some houses and a metropark along the way. a few tight turns as well, then running alongside railroad tracks and the cuyahoga river.
after the last tight turn i saw a brightly lit object in the distance off to the left slightly, right near where the metropark area would be. at first thought perhaps a helicopter.
then as i got closer, the object has slowly moved over the road and as i went to drive under it, i noticed no sound. stopped, turned down my radio and tried looking up through the windshield to see it.
my driver's window is broken, so i opened the door, stuck my head out and looked up. a brightly lit object was overhead at maybe 400-500 ft. three brilliant blue-white lights in a traingle. one corner also has a strobing reddish light. i then stepped out of the car (still running, in park) and stood there for maybe another 10-15 seconds. it was so brightly lit i could see some details of what looked like a smoothish bottom, greyish colored with some type of geometric pattern covering the surface. 
the object then started to rotate in pace and slowly starter to move off the road over the woods to the right, towards the railroad tracks and then the river.
i thought then i would try to get a picture. i bent down, reached into the car and grabbed my cell phone from the passenger seat. i was in the car  no more than 5 seconds, and was swiping the screen as i stood back up to get the camera on.
i looked up, and the object was no where to be seen.
stood there another 5 minutes or more dumbstruck. perfectly clear night sky. i just a few minutes i had seen numerous high-altitude planes flying the area as well.
am pissed off that i took my eye off of it and did not see it go away. it had to either have blinked off or shot away, as it was moving very slowly when i last saw it, and should have been no more than another few hundred feet away by the time i got the camera app ready.
anyways...That's what i saw last sunday night. a brightly lit triangle, right near the city.
content.summary: Saw what first thought was helicopter. from underneath saw traingle

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a nevada trip in october in 2017 in the daytime and we drove back through the nevada desert coming back to california i snapped some photos within the car. my window was down when i snapped photos. i didn't realize i captured anything in my photo until i returned home and saw it. there was no indication of anything out of the ordinary as i was taking photos of the mountains.
i didn't expect to capture anything like this. it is very surprising.  
(unidentified ariel phenomenon) the object looked like a solid, bright, white light and football shaped leaving a white trail behind it. the object looked to be imitating it's own light from within. there are no windows or wings and no sound was heard.  thank you.
content.summary: From inside the car in nevada i rolled down the window to take this photo i later saw it on my photo

content.detailedDescription: I was with my brother on a walk with the dog. he nudged me and said do you see that? i looked up and at first i thought it was a weird group of birds, with a closer look it looked like drones. they were in a chevron position and spun like a clock and then i realized it wasnt drones. evech indivival body had its own set of  individual dimmed yellow-orange lights. it alomst looked like this object was photoshopped into the sky. after around 8 second the object seemed to dissingrate, dissapering into the sky. there was a clear sky out that night so the didnt dissapear behind a cloud.
content.summary: 8ish yellow-orange lights in a chevron alignment spinning similar to a clock. moved across eastern sky an hour after sunset then faded away.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was in my early days of high school, and our bus was on the way to the school. me and practically the entire bus saw a metallic orb right above where we could see the sun rising though it could have only been a mile or two above ground, and began to morph into a vertical cylinder-shape with pointed ends,  then switched to a horizontal shape, then was suddenly gone like it had darted away. we all saw it, about twelve of us. none of us knew what it was though me and two other people quickly decided it wasn't anything we'd ever seen before.
content.summary: Started out as a metallic ball right above where we could see the sun, reflected light from it, changed shape several times to a cylinder like shape and such before disappearing

content.detailedDescription: Ok i was working in the hills in mendo county cleaning up fire debris when working out doors i look up when i see chemtrail planes go over head.Well this time it had a yellow object following trailing with it then the object goes left right down then rigth under the plane,3 seconds later it flashed and it was gone,very to be seen.It triped me out all day
content.summary: Ok was working i the hills  cleaning up fire debris when working out doors look up when i see a chemtrail plane go over head.Well this time it had a yellow object following trailing if it then i flashed and it was gone

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were sitting in the backyard on a saturday night chatting, when around 1:20 am we both looked up into the sky at the exact same moment. that's when we both saw a fast bright tear shaped light ball (no tail) passing maybe about 18000 feet high going about 90 mph. it disappeared behind a cloud and never came out on the other side of the cloud. it also appeared that inside this bright light was another smaller, brighter and round light.
content.summary: Bright fast passing low light

content.detailedDescription: After trying to go to bed i gave up and decided to look out my patio door. when i looked south i noticed a brighter than normal red object. then i noticed that there was another one when it split off and headed east. then, i seen another head west over the town. the first object continued coming north toward me. excited, i steped out my door to see it pass between the apartment buildings. they glowed red, made no noise, and the size was approximately the size of a single car garage.
content.summary: Three round red objects heading north one flew east another went west over town and the last one went right between my apartment buildings.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving down  us hwy 285, alamosa, co 81101, passed rio grande ranch on the right side of road, across fence laid several dead, mutilated cattle with no faces and odd looking.
content.summary: Was driving through wetlands passed rio vega ranch and found several mutilated cattle with faces removed, and very messed because no blood

content.detailedDescription:
I have attached several videos that are strange and i can't explain.  these events happen often at my property. these are not visible to my naked eye.  also there is always a strange sound the cameras pick up but i can't hear them.  the sound sounds like a pattern every time.

i have 5 blink cameras outside around my house. i would like to know what that sound is? and those white rods flying around. the other ones in back yard ufos.  the light in the tree is not there nor is it a street light.

these cameras run 24/7.  in the end maybe someone can explain the lights in back yard and that round thing in corner of yard.
content.summary: Many strange events

content.detailedDescription: It was round bright light white or electric blue pulsating i didn't think anything of it turned around the rectangular part was gone but the round orb looking object stayed hovered for a long time flashing strange colors then slowly move to the west would drop down like it was going to fall and then would rise back up this went on for approximately 30 minutes this light comes around once or twice a month and does the same thing same path that's quite odd.
content.summary: Went outside to put laundry on to drive walked out looked noticed a white light blinking with the electric blue rectangle o top of it thought it was a plane ignored it put the clothes on the dryer i turned around triangle was gone the orb stayed

content.detailedDescription: I live on the 3rd floor of a apartment complex. i smoke out on my deck everyday. i live near pomona air force base. i see all different kinds of military & commercial aircraft all day long. this was something i have never seen before. the way it moved, very slowly, with no sound. it had what looked like a force field around it. either it was used for propulsion or not, i don't know. i observed it for 10 to 15 minutes. it was a black triangle, with a circular field around it. it was moving so slow, & straight, ascending at the same time. i thought it would fall out-of the sky.  honestly, it could of been military craft. i'm not sure. i know, i've never seen anything like it before. while observing the object, it continued in a  straight, ascending movement, until it vanished into thin air. what was so odd was how slow it moved, & the force field  around the craft. i continue to sit out on my deck to see if i notice it again.
content.summary: I observed a black triangle shape craft. it made no sound. it had a circular force field around it. maybe it's propulsion.

content.detailedDescription:
I was fishing the st. clair river at the north end of the water treatment plant. i started fishing around 5:15 pm. i was sitting there waiting for a bite when i heard a man yelling very loud from the parking lot at the police department which is next to the water treatment plant on the north side. he yelled oh wow ! wow ! then he kinda laughed excitedly. i immediately looked to the north and seen a silver and gold reflecting object hovering very slowly over the st. clair river. it looked like a rippling rectangle shaped mirror.It was about the height of the bridges from the water.The object was moving slowly from west to east, which is from port huron michigan to sarnia ontario. the object started flashing very reflective colors that kept changing. it was like a gyroscope of colored mirrors for lack of better words.The object was about the size of a car, but was more of a rectangle shape. as it neared the canadian shoreline, it started to ascend and flew around faster but went towards the clouds. it was very reflective the entire time i observed it. 
when i first seen it, i tried to make sense of it. i tried to say it’s a plane, a helicopter, a helium balloon, a jet, a drone, but it wasn’t. it didn’t make any sounds and the way it was hovering, and flying was very unique. by the time i realized i was looking at a ufo, it was up over sarnia flying around and into the clouds. i got a small video clip but that doesn’t do it justice. i couldn’t see the screen on my phone very well because of a glare. 
i lost sight of the object when it flew in a cloud high up in the sky.
might be irrelevant, but i seen a us coast guard boat heading out into lake huron about 20 minutes before i witnessed it. about 30-40 minutes after i lost sight of the object, that same coast guard boat was heading back in the river. 
i don’t know where the object came from, i first seen it over the river.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovered over center of st. clair river at about the same height of the bridges. constantly changing reflective colors. as it flew east to canada, it gained altitude and hid in clouds

content.detailedDescription: Heading to work on a dark early morning, i was driving down a country road with no street lights or any other type of light that may have been the cause of the sighting. as i am driving a bright light streams across the sky ahead of my car (100 feet or less from the ground). too fast to be a plane or helicopter and too low to be a shooting star or meteorite. the object continued its rapid trajectory towards the east over the trees.
content.summary: Bright light streams across sky

content.detailedDescription: During star gazing in thailand, what appeared to be a satellite emerged in the night’s sky. hit had a bright glow and was moving at speed. however, it abruptly changed direction and shot across the sky. we saw it again, do a similar thing. the speed didn’t change but the direction did. it travelled in perfectly straight lines - beautiful but unnerving at the same time.
content.summary: Bright light travelling at speed, initially looked like a satellite but changed direction abruptly.

content.detailedDescription:
On tuesday march 13, 2018 at approximately 8:00am ast i witnessed the following event in the sky above lake havasu city, az;

i saw an airplane approaching from the west when it was about 30% above the horizon and still some miles west of town. it was pretty high up, maybe 20k feet. it was a clear day and i noticed right away that the wing tips appeared quite bright. as it approached the city it slowly became apparent that the brightness was not because of lights on the wings or reflection of the sun off the wingtips. they were too far away from the fuselage and were brighter than any lights i've ever seen on wings. once the plane got right over town the objects were plain to see. both were plain white orbs. no more, no less. they were flying maybe the length of a wingspan away off each wingtip. i don't know what caused their brightness when looking at them from the front. it was also easy to see that the airplane was a large 4-engine military jet. as the jet passed on out of town to the east the orbs pealed off one at a time an headed south. the jet made a large left bank and headed back to the west. while the jet was parallel to town i got a better look at it and am certain it was a large 4-engine military. don't know if it was a transport or a refueler or what. definitely not a b-52. it was high enough that i couldn't hear it.

i have video of the event, but my camera only captures at 720p and the jet was pretty high up.

about 15 minutes later i heard a fighter jet, but couldn't spot it. two more fighter jets made passes within the next hour but i couldn't see them, either.
content.summary: Large military plane accompanied by two white orbs.

content.detailedDescription: This object with multi colored flashing light has been in plain view from my house off and on for .Months and it has been out the last three nights in a row. it moves around like something you would see in a video game controlled by a drunk with the shakes. and recently while driving at night to reno while stopped on the top of the passnear the nevada boarder. i saw the same thing do the same thing. there i was alone but tonight i woke a family member to see it,she tried to take pictures with her phone but it was very hard to see,
content.summary: Multi colored object darting up,down,left,right in no obvious set routes and stayed for hou

content.detailedDescription:
I looked out my window and seen a red dot orb moving where i usually see activity. i went out and captured the red dot briefly, but then noticed an orb that seemed to possibly morph into plane.

i have been wondering if they are morphing into planes, but this maybe some evidence. after if morphed it came over my apt and did have sound, but as you can see it moved in one place for a while then changes into 2 lights.
content.summary: I looked out my window and seen a red dot orb moving where i usually see activity. i went out and captured the red dot breifly, but then noticed an orb that seemed to possibly morph into plane.

content.detailedDescription: It was early saturday morning around 5:40am in maple ridge, b.C. i went out to my back porch to have a cigarette. i looked over towards the mountains and saw this bright white light flying towards me from the west. so i watched it for a few seconds and realized that this was the same light i  saw the night before around 10pm. so i ran down stairs and got my camera and took ten pics as it flew over my street and the neighbors house. the reason i  saw this the night previous was i was out smoking a cigarette again. lol  i just happened to be counting all the air planes that i could see in the sky, there was six to seven and then i saw this light to the west. flying north from the south and then it just blinked out. so when i saw it in the morning i was not going to miss getting these pics so i could zoom in and see what i was. it was also not making any noise. i see planes and helicopters all the time as i live in a big city. my feelings towards this object are that this was flying vary smooth and did not make one noise and to me that is not a conventional aircraft. so here i am writing this so all can see what is flying around are sky's.
content.summary: I went out for a cigarette on my back porch and saw a bright white light flying my way.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the walmart parking lot. at around 9pm local i just glanced up when pulling out of parking and so an unusually bright tea light. it was pretty bright. when it went out it would flash brilliantly. at first i thought maybe it was flares from a fighter. i have seen those before. however they only lasted about 2-4 seconds at a time. it would flash out then reappear a short distance away, and never in a pattern, always random but in the same specific area.
content.summary: So bright reddish orange lights apperaing at random.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside skimming the pool. felt hot & looked up in the sky. for rest see short description. i took 4 photos, one right after the other.
 saw large ring around the sun & took pictures. noticed a light after the fact.
content.summary: Saw large ring around the sun & took pictures. noticed a light after the fact.

content.detailedDescription:
Calgary, alberta, canada.

i was standing out on my deck when i looked up over the roof of my house. i saw something that i first thought was a bird but it floated down almost like a feather. when i realized it was not a bird of any kind it changed position and hovered over southwest calgary. it seemed to be bending light around it but i could still make out the shape and see lights on it. it was a triangle shape. it was stationary for about 30 seconds as it rotated slowly then i lost sight of it behind the neighbour's trees. i could not find it after that. i estimate that the altitude was about twice as high as a traffic helicopter.

i was amazed how silent and elegant it looked.

this is my second sighting. the first was about 10 years ago when me and other campers watched one of the cigar shaped ones with the big headlight on the front float over our campground in the alberta foothills. sibbald creek camp ground. 

what's the chance of seeing two ufo's in your lifetime. i can't help wondering who is driving these things.

thanks mufon for all you do.
content.summary: Floated down like a feather, changed position then hovered rotating, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Was unlocking car door to leave friends house 2:30 am. as i was about to insert key, i looked up and i saw a grey alien staring at me. i froze for 5 seconds. felt overwhelmed, i knew in an instance he/it knew me better than i know myself. terrified, i turned right and ran back into my friends trailer. told him what i saw. had him escort me to my car, i drove home which is .01 miles away at the time, childhood home. i kind of erased it from my memory, not believing it myself. then the next night or a couple nights later at the same address. [removed slang and undesirable talk to investigators section] i was on the walkway that led to the driveway. i looked up and saw two yellow goldfish orange white lights. 100feet away. as it approached 75ft, i then saw three gold lights. it kept coming toward me straight line. it was tree top low. it was lower than this massive tree right beside the trailer, the tree top didn't exist to this craft. so two lights at first, that's the flat side of equilateral. at 75ft the 3rd light came on. at this time i made out the black structure that had these lights on the bottom of it. flat black, blacker than the night sky. 40ft sides estimated. 6ft thick. straight crisp edges. it kept coming straight at me. standing on the pathway, about 20ft away from the straight side (forward side) a middle 4th light turned on. the three main lights had observable light emitting around edges. not a beam. magnificent bright light yet soft on the eyes as in if you were turned sideways it wouldn't be the same as flashlight shining as u could see on the bridge of ur nose. the fourth light was the same color and also was circular, yet smaller circumference almost by half. the three main lights were probably 4ft in diameter.  the 4th light was focused on me and i didn't break eye contact with that magnificent light. it went off after the center light went passed me about 15feet. the 3 other lights stayed the same. it was about 27-33 feet above the ground. that altitude was maintained throughout. the speed i would say was no more than 15mph, that also stayed the same throughout. at about 35 feet after it hovered over over me it turned slightly right 30degrees then continued straight. hovering at 30 feet throughout right over people's homes i wanted to scream so people would come outside to see, but i didn't. my friend then comes out and asks what was that. i pointed and he saw the craft 100 feet away and was going out of sight. i was thinking about chasing it, it's low speed would've easily follow in a car, but we just stood there in shock. there was no heat from the craft or air movement, everything was still, not the slightest gust of wind. there was a slight humm, and and even slighter buzz to it. my friend said he heard/felt that hum and felt weird. no flashes of abduction memory. i feel i was analyzed by the center light. i had the final papers for the army i was about to sign, to be an infantrymen even though scoring high on asvab. after the event i wanted no part in the military. i felt lied to. so there was a good outcome to this, it was a real eye opener. this happened to me 5 years ago. there hasn't been a single day since i haven't thought of my experience. it stays with me. i'll always remember the greys black almond eyes staring into my soul. he was 6ft, spindly, arms at side. there was a street light emitting on him, metal halide type. it was overwhelming, thus i ran. evil didn't pop up in my head. if a friend was beside me while locking eyes, i would not have ran. sometimes i regret running. but nonetheless, i didn't join the military industrial complex. please reply to any light you can shine on this encounter, i beg you. even the slightest bit of info in return will direly be appreciated. thank you for reading the pinnacle pivot point of my life, i will forever remember. thank you for your time. the world is dark, and i'm scared.
content.summary: An equilateral, flat side forward, pointy end facing rear. three  goldfish, yellow, orange, white light. then center light same color. flat black, seemless. 40ft sides. 6ft thick

content.detailedDescription:
I have decided to share with mufon an experience i had many years ago.  i have not been ashamed or afraid to share this story, and have in fact spoken of it with many family members and friends over the years.  now that i frequently watch hangar 1, i wish to share it with you.  i realize that there is likely no where to go as far as an investigative effort into this incident due to the lapse of time and with no proof other than my story.

one summer night in the early 1980s, i was returning to my home in the small central alberta town where i then lived.  it was near midnight.  before i entered my house, i paused on the doorstep and looked straight up into the clear moonless sky.

in awe of the brilliant stars i could see, within a few seconds i noticed three lights moving in triangular formation coming from the north at what i felt was a rate of speed comparable to satellites.  interestingly enough, there is a segment in the opening credits of each hangar 1 episode where three lights cross the sky that remind me of what i saw.  "my lights", however, were hardly more than pinpricks in the inky black sky.  they appeared to be flying at an extremely high altitude also not unlike satellites.  believing it was a satellite or a trio of satellites, i was not particularly affected by what i saw.  i refer to a "trio of satellites" as there was no obvious evidence of the lights being separate crafts or all part of one vehicle.

when the lights were almost directly above me, the display upped its ante.  without altering formation, all three lights came to an abrupt halt.  there was no period of slowing down; the forward progress of the -- whatever they were -- stopped on the proverbial dime.  the lights remained stationary for a short time, probably less than five seconds.  then at a much higher rate of speed than they were travelling previously, perhaps as much as ten times faster, the lights moved and disappeared from view.  again there was no period of acceleration:  0 to 100, as it were, in less than a second.  however, they did not travel together in a triangle as they had done when i first saw them.  two of the lights raced off side by side in the same southerly direction.  the third went alone in an easterly direction.  all three were gone from my sight in an unbelievably brief time frame.

it was only when the lights hovered and then raced away so quickly that i started thinking i was seeing ufos.  at no time, then or since, have i felt threatened or targeted.  this lack of fear was probably because of what i perceived to be such a great distance between them and me.  i did not suffer any trauma, illness, or disadvantageous long-term effects.

to the best of my memory, i have always believed that we are not alone in this enormous universe.  following that incident about four decades ago, i am more convinced of this.  after this sighting, i entered my home and prepared for bed, devoid of any unease.  to be sure, i reflected on what i had just witnessed.  then and since.  i do not feel as though my life has been affected adversely by the events of that night so long ago.  nor do i feel that my life would be disturbed if i were to see the same thing tonight.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three lights travelling southerly, paused, two continued south, one went easterly

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a small house where i lived in ashfield township, ontario, canada.  it was around 8 or so at night and i was letting my brothers dog out for a pee.  i opened the sliding door that was off my bedroom and that lead to the backyard and the farm fields.  as i was waiting for bubba at the door i noticed how bright the moon was and how odd it was that there was 3 planes in the sky.  in that area air traffic is rare... so 3 planes at one time  was odd to me.  i remember watching the planes going in either direction and that's when i noticed lights flashing out the corner of my eyes.  i looked to my right to see this thing in the sky above the two apple trees in our back yard.  the flashing lights were in fact the band on lights that ran through the center of what appeared to be some sort of craft.  there was red and white lights moving round and round the center.  the craft appeared to be dark or black and like a disk with a bumped up middle. i was shocked and calling out for the dog, soon after what was there vanished right in front of my eyes.  it was there then gone in a flash.  i remember watching the trees and saw it how they moved with the wind and how in contrast this craft moved not at all.  it was silent and still.  i ended up getting the dog inside and shortly after a black helicopter and two silver planes flew above.  i went inside. it's taken me about to report this for a few reasons.  2017 was a very dark and sad year if loss for me.  since i have decided to do this the director of training, ryan stacey had been a great help and i am grateful.
two weeks after this event i saw orange orbs in the farm fields behind the house. maybe about ten of them.  they dashed around the fields and in the trees but i didn't hang around long enough to see for how long.  i closed up the curtains and stayed inside.
on december 9th i had an experience with what i call the reptilian man, it was a 4 day fiasco of which i am sure. i woke paralyzed from the head down in my bedroom and yet could tell i was being moved on my bed.  i reluctantly turn my head from left to up and my eyes looked directly into the eyes of a snake man.  he was populating with me.  i couldn't speak and didn't want to even deal with it or it being a possible dream.  it was not hurting me but i am certain he or it wanted me to see the act.  there was no emotions and no expressions the act was militabt. it was an intrusive act and rape quite frankly that was not violent or unpleasant, i felt nothing. i told myself i would deal with it in the morning and what back to sleep.  when i woke in the morning i was freaking out.
now i want to know, why would it even have done that?  i am rh o neg and have two wombs... having children for me is nearly impossible not short of a miracle.  i thought reptiles didn't procreate for any other reason than breeding? since this all happened between nov and dec. my life changed.  i moved to niagara to care for my dying mother and since have left to western canada.  i worry now about many things.  i still am having issues with the idea that these beings can invade your home and head space and there is nothing we can do about it. now i wonder if the beings and ghosts and experiences i have had my entire life are related and worrying that the idea of abductions are now reality! maybe they were always a reality unknown to me?
content.summary: I saw 3 air planes in the sky and from the corner of my eyes i saw lights moving above the apple trees to my right.  when i looked to see what it was, i noticed the craft.  then it just vanished.  soon after i saw a black helicopter and two silver planes
